UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Development of novel broad-spectrum antimicrobial lipopeptides derived from plantaricin NC8 β.
Literature.Author: Wiman E, Zattarin E, Aili D, Bengtsson T, Selegård R, Khalaf H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=1.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=1.5µM),Escherichia coli K12 MG1655(MIC=3.1µM),Escherichia coli K12 MG1655(MBC=3.1µM)
